unnormalised: Social Media & Influencer Marketing: Follower Analytics You Can Actually Use!
normalised: Social Media and Influencer Marketing: Follower Analytics You Can Actually Use!

unnormalised: Are you running an Instagram campaign, trying to be the next big influencer like Bhuvan Bam? Or maybe you're managing social media for your uncle's mithai shop, "Agrawal Sweets" in Chandni Chowk? Then listen up, because follower analytics are your best friend!
normalised: Are you running an Instagram campaign, trying to be the next big influencer like Bhuvan Bam? Or maybe you are managing social media for your uncle's mithai shop, "Agrawal Sweets" in Chandni Chowk? Then listen up, because follower analytics are your best friend!

unnormalised: Gone are the days of just counting followers. We're talking deep dives into engagement rates, demographic breakdowns (who's actually from Delhi vs. Mumbai?), and figuring out *when* your audience is online. Did you know, posts around 7 PM on weekdays often perform better in India?
normalised: Gone are the days of just counting followers. We are talking deep dives into engagement rates, demographic breakdowns (who is actually from Delhi versus Mumbai?), and figuring out *when* your audience is online. Did you know, posts around seven P M on weekdays often perform better in India?

unnormalised: Platforms like Instagram and Facebook offer basic insights, but consider third-party tools for a more granular view. They can tell you which of your posts resonated most (that picture of ladoos at Diwali on 24/10/2022 probably killed it!), or which influencer partnerships are actually driving sales. Plus, they can help you identify fake followers—because nobody wants those!
normalised: Platforms like Instagram and Facebook offer basic insights, but consider third-party tools for a more granular view. They can tell you which of your posts resonated most (that picture of ladoos at Diwali on twenty fourth October two thousand and twenty two probably killed it!), or which influencer partnerships are actually driving sales. Plus, they can help you identify fake followers—because nobody wants those!

unnormalised: Analyze trends from 15/08/2023 to now and see what works! Remember, it's not just about reach, it's about *connecting* with your audience. Think quality over quantity. Use this information to tailor your content. Schedule that reel showcasing your Gulab Jamuns for, say, 09:00 hrs tomorrow? You might just see a boost!
normalised: Analyze trends from fifteenth August two thousand and twenty three to now and see what works! Remember, it is not just about reach, it is about *connecting* with your audience. Think quality over quantity. Use this information to tailor your content. Schedule that reel showcasing your Gulab Jamuns for, say, zero nine hundred hours tomorrow? You might just see a boost!
